thread.title: Gulf Shores crash: SUV truck ploughs into school marching band at Mardi Gras parade injuring 11 students
thread.title_full: Gulf Shores crash: SUV truck ploughs into school marching band at Mardi Gras parade injuring 11 students

author: Rachel Bishop
title: Gulf Shores crash: SUV truck ploughs into school marching band at Mardi Gras parade injuring 11 students
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
At least 11 people have been injured after a car ploughed into a school marching band at Mardi Gras in Alabama today. 
At least eight teenagers were hospitalised and three people left critically injured. 
A tearful witness said a car shot across the road and hit the Gulf Shores High School Marching Band just before the parade started. 
The man told American news channel WKRG that the vehicle's "wheels were still spinning" when he ran to help the victims - some of which were still stuck under the car. A tearful witness said a car shot across the road and hit the Gulf Shores High School Marching Band just before the parade started (Photo: wkrg) Chaos at the Mardi Gras parade in Gulf Shores (Photo: wkrg) 
He told the network the car was at a nearby McDonald's moments before it careered towards the crowd. 
Footage from the scene showed people scattered across the road as paramedics desperately rushed to their aid. Read More 
Grant Brown, a spokesperson for the city of Gulf Shores told wrbl.com : â€œA teenage band had just started to march down the parade route when they were struck from behind. 
"The vehicle was apart of the parade." 
The Gulf Shores Parade has been cancelled and the parade route along Highway 59 and surrounding roads have been closed. Victims being tended to on the ground (Photo: wkrg) 
Gulf Shores Police are appealing for anyone with footage or pictures of the crash to send it to officers. 
City of Gulf Shores released a statement on Facebook saying: "The Gulf Shores Mardi Gras Parade is cancelled due to an injury at the start of the lineup. 
"North bound Highway 59 traffic closed north of clubhouse drive. Detour east and west to get to the Highway 59 Bridge." 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story. 
For the latest news and breaking news visit Mirror.co.uk/news . Like us on Facebook
